definitions.definition: Located directly across from something else, or from each other.
examples: She saw him walking on the opposite side of the road.

definitions.definition: Of leaves and flowers , positioned directly across from each other on a stem.

examples: They were moving in opposite directions.

definitions.definition: Of either of two complementary or mutually exclusive things.
examples: He is attracted to the opposite sex.

definitions.definition: Extremely different; inconsistent; contrary; repugnant; antagonistic.

main_definition: Located directly across from something else, or from each other.
secondary_definitions: ( botany ) Of leaves and flowers , positioned directly across from each other on a stem.
Of either of two complementary or mutually exclusive things.
Extremely different; inconsistent; contrary; repugnant; antagonistic.
